name: Spark
description: Deal 8 damage, 10% chance to stun target (skips next queued action)

immediateEffect.script: DealDamage(Opponent, 8); if (Rng.Next(100) < 10) { if (OpponentQueue.Count > 0) { var stunned = OpponentQueue[0]; OpponentQueue.RemoveAt(0); OpponentDiscard.Add(stunned); Log(OpponentDisplayName + " is stunned! " + stunned.Name + " is cancelled!"); } }
